objects.text:
• Natural Bakuchiol & Seabuckthorn
• Evens Out Skin Tone
• Minimizes Fine Lines
• Rich in Antioxidants

7-in-1 formula meticulously crafted to
deliver glowing, healthy, and
rejuvenated skin for all skin types.

product_details.name: Radiance 7-in-1 Ayurvedic Face Serum | Bakuchiol & Seabuckthorn | Anti-aging, Glowing, Hydrated skin
product_details.description:
Meticulously crafted to deliver glowing, healthy, and rejuvenated skin. Featuring a potent blend of Bakuchiol, a gentle plant-based alternative to retinol, and Seabuckthorn, known for its rich antioxidant profile, this serum transforms your skincare ritual by targeting multiple concerns at once.
Benefits: Evens Out Skin Tone, Fades Dark Spots, Hydrates Deeply, Minimizes Fine Lines, Protects Against Aging, Boosts Elasticity, Rich in Antioxidants

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and clean promotional design for a skincare product. The layout is divided diagonally with an elegant dual-tone gradient background: forest green in the upper left and a smooth beige in the lower right. The main headline (`heading`) in a bold architectural font grabs attention, followed by a gold subheading (`subheading`) that introduces the product category. The feature list (`features`) appears as bullet points in white, emphasizing the product's natural ingredients and benefits. A brief supporting text (`description`) enhances credibility. The price (`price`) is prominently displayed, and accompanied by a clearly defined call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with the text (`cta`). A product image (`product_image`) is placed to the right, enhancing visual appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Forest Green: #1E402A
- Deep Olive: #2D5A3B
- Warm Gold: #D4B572
- Light Beige: #E8D4A9
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a luxurious and natural color palette dominated by deep forest green (#3C5B42) and accented with warm gold (#D4AC47). The green evokes a sense of nature, organic purity, and freshness, making it perfect for skincare branding. Gold elements give the product an upscale and premium feel, prominently highlighting the brand name and product title, enhancing their visibility and appeal. The subtle blending of green and gold is cohesive, while the white (#FFFFFF) text offers clarity and balance against the darker background. These colors are harmoniously blended, yet create strong visual contrast for emphasis. Ideal banner palette includes: forest green (#3C5B42), gold (#D4AC47), white (#FFFFFF).
